title: Washed-Out Rockstar
desc:
*Finally achieved great fame. Not for music, but for killing a guy.*

Its attacks have a 50% to apply the Shock effect to you for a turn, preventing you from using any Battle Items. Don't be greedy with your healing items, or you might be caught at low HP and unable to heal.

The Janitor's debuff-cleaning Soap is given a special exception. If need be, you can use it to remove the Shock and allow use of other items.
